short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity and relaxation with Pomodoro Timer, Prayer Times, and Lofi Music in one sleek Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your productivity and relaxation with our all-in-one Chrome extension. This feature-packed extension combines a Pomodoro Timer, Prayer Times, and Lofi Music Player to create the ultimate toolkit for a focused and peaceful work environment.

The Pomodoro Timer helps you stay on track and maintain productivity by breaking your work into manageable intervals. Customize the session length and break duration to suit your preferences, and watch the progress bar as it guides you through each session.

Stay connected to your spiritual practice with the Prayer Times feature. Get accurate prayer timings based on your location, ensuring you never miss an important prayer. Stay organized and prioritize your spiritual well-being effortlessly.

Need to unwind and relax? The Lofi Music Player provides a soothing ambiance to create a calming atmosphere. Enjoy a curated collection of relaxing lofi beats, perfect for study sessions, meditation, or simply unwinding after a long day.

With its sleek design and intuitive interface, our Chrome extension offers a seamless user experience. Whether you're looking to boost productivity, stay connected to your spiritual routine, or find a moment of tranquility, this extension has you covered. Elevate your browsing experience and create the ideal environment for focus, relaxation, and mindfulness.
